name: Shadowboxing Power Bursts (Glycolytic)
notes: Max-speed combos. No pacing

name: Sled Drag Sprints (ATP-PCr)
notes: Load: 30% BW. Walk back = rest

name: Med Ball Throw Circuit (Glycolytic)
duration: 4 rounds: 10 slams, 10 chest passes, 10 rotational throws
notes: 6-8kg ball. 30s rest between rounds

name: Broad Jump Repeats (ATP-PCr)
notes: Stick landings. Full reset between reps

name: Grapple Escapes Under Fatigue (Glycolytic)
notes: Partner drills only. No live sparring

name: Clinch Knee Storm Intervals
notes: Non-stop knee strikes from plum position. Drive hips through dummy.
equipment_note: Anchor dummy to wall if needed.

name: Forward-Blast Heavy Bag Intervals
notes: Advance relentlessly while throwing power hooks. No backpedaling.

name: Wall-Wrestling Pummel Rounds
notes: Pummel for underhooks while pressed against wall. Simulates cage work.

name: Switch-Kick Endurance Drill
tags.notes: Alternate roundhouse kicks every 2 seconds. Focus on hip turnover.

tags.name: Brawler's Body Shot Barrage
tags.notes: Digging hooks to the body. Exhale sharply with each shot.
tags.equipment_note: Wear bag gloves for knuckle protection.

tags.name: Clinch-to-Strike Transition Drill
tags.notes: Break clinch into 3-punch combos. Reset immediately.
tags.equipment_note: Partner wears belly pad for body shots.

tags.name: Sprawl-to-Strike Intervals
tags.notes: Sprawl, then spring up into 2 knees + 2 elbows.
tags.equipment_note: Use wrestling mat for knee protection.

tags.name: Counter Striker's Shell Defense Drill
tags.notes: Block/parry flurries, then counter with 3-punch combos.

tags.name: Submission Chain Fatigue Drill
tags.notes: Cycle through 3 submission attempts without pausing.

tags.name: Teep-and-Clinch Gauntlet
tags.notes: 3 teeps followed by clinch knee series. Repeat.

tags.name: Sprawl-to-Takedown Reaction Drill
tags.notes: Partner signals shot randomly. React with sprawl then immediate takedown.

tags.name: Lateral Escape Plyo Pushoffs
tags.notes: Explode off back foot to evade imaginary strike. Land in stance.

tags.name: Guillotine Shot Sprints
tags.notes: Sprint 10m, drop to guillotine grip, reset. Repeat.

tags.name: Switch-Kick Power Bursts
tags.notes: Max-power roundhouse kicks with full hip rotation.

tags.name: Takedown Shot Reaction Drill
tags.notes: Partner points direction; shooter explodes that way.

tags.name: Cross-Counter Plyo Pushups
tags.notes: Explode up from pushup to cross stance. Mimics counter weight transfer.

tags.name: Thai Plum Explosion Drill
tags.notes: Yank partner's neck down with full power from plum position.
